text: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ أَثَٰثٗا وَرِءۡيٗا

translation.en: And how many a generation have We destroyed before them who were better in possessions and [outward] appearance
translation.id: Dan berapa banyak umat (yang ingkar) yang telah Kami binasakan sebelum mereka, padahal mereka lebih bagus perkakas rumah tangganya dan (lebih sedap) dipandang mata
